DOC.brief_summary: In patient receive organ transplant , body considers organ foreign attempt destroy . This call rejection . All patient receive organ transplant , take combination anti-rejection medication . These medication prevent new organ reject body . FTY720 new compound help prevent organ rejection .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety FTY720 Patients Who Receive Kidney Transplantation
DOC.criteria: First kidney transplantation Male female patient Between 18 65 year old Patient need multiorgan transplant Patients history cardiac arrest Patients past present malignancy
